name: makeup-screenreader-trap
description: Restricts screen reader virtual cursor to a single subtree in the DOM
author: Ian McBurnie <ianmcburnie@hotmail.com>

scripts.start: npm run build && parallelshell "npm run server" "npm run watch"
scripts.test: npm run transpile && npm run lasso:test && npm run clean && karma start --autoWatch false --singleRun true
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run transpile && npm run lasso
scripts.lasso: lasso require-run:./docs/index.js --out docs/static --inject-into docs/index.html --name bundle && npm run clean:lasso
scripts.lasso:test: lasso require-run:./test/index.js --name bundle-test --out test/static --config ./test/lasso-config.json && npm run clean:lasso
scripts.clean: rimraf reports .DS_Store test/.DS_Store src/.DS_Store docs/.DS_Store && npm run clean:lasso
scripts.watch: onchange src/*.js docs/*.js -- npm run build
scripts.transpile: babel src/index.js --out-file index.js && babel src/util.js --out-file util.js
